description: An MCP server that provides persistent multimodal context storage for LLM agents.

STORAGE_BACKEND.description: Storage backend type: sqlite (default) or postgresql

MAX_IMAGE_SIZE_MB.description: Maximum individual image size in megabytes

MAX_TOTAL_SIZE_MB.description: Maximum total request size in megabytes

POOL_MAX_READERS.description: Maximum number of concurrent read connections in the pool

POOL_MAX_WRITERS.description: Maximum number of concurrent write connections in the pool

POOL_HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL_S.description: Connection health check interval in seconds

RETRY_MAX_RETRIES.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations

RETRY_BASE_DELAY_S.description: Base delay in seconds between retry attempts

RETRY_MAX_DELAY_S.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retry attempts

RETRY_JITTER.description: Enable random jitter in retry delays

RETRY_BACKOFF_FACTOR.description: Exponential backoff multiplication factor for retries

SQLITE_SYNCHRONOUS.description: SQLite synchronous mode (e.g., NORMAL, FULL, OFF)

SQLITE_TEMP_STORE.description: SQLite temporary storage location (e.g., MEMORY, FILE)

SQLITE_MMAP_SIZE.description: SQLite memory-mapped I/O size in bytes

SQLITE_CACHE_SIZE.description: SQLite cache size (negative value for KB, positive for pages)

SQLITE_WAL_AUTOCHECKPOINT.description: SQLite WAL autocheckpoint threshold in pages

SQLITE_WAL_CHECKPOINT.description: SQLite WAL checkpoint mode (e.g., PASSIVE, FULL, RESTART)

SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT_TEST_S.description: Test mode shutdown timeout in seconds

QUEUE_TIMEOUT_TEST_S.description: Test mode queue timeout in seconds

CIRCUIT_BREAKER_FAILURE_THRESHOLD.description: Circuit breaker failure threshold before opening

CIRCUIT_BREAKER_RECOVERY_TIMEOUT_S.description: Circuit breaker recovery timeout in seconds

CIRCUIT_BREAKER_HALF_OPEN_MAX_CALLS.description: Maximum calls allowed in circuit breaker half-open state

POSTGRESQL_CONNECTION_STRING.description: Complete PostgreSQL connection string (overrides individual settings if provided)

POSTGRESQL_POOL_TIMEOUT_S.description: PostgreSQL connection pool timeout in seconds

POSTGRESQL_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_S.description: PostgreSQL command execution timeout in seconds

POSTGRESQL_SSL_MODE.description: PostgreSQL SSL mode (disable, allow, prefer, require, verify-ca, verify-full)

OLLAMA_HOST.description: Ollama API host URL for embedding generation

EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Embedding model name for semantic search

FTS_LANGUAGE.description: Language for FTS stemming (e.g., english, german, french)
